articles.title: Boeing Starliner Isn't Going Anywhere, Spaceship Removed From the Launch Pad - autoevolution
articles.description: It would seem that at least for a while the SpaceX Crew Dragon will remain the only American-made spacecraft to ferry astronauts to and from the International Space Station. This reality came to pass this week, after Boeing somehow managed to fail its second …
articles.content: The Crew Dragon and Starliner were developed roughly at the same time, and were supposed to go into service concomitantly, marking the first time since the space shuttle program when America could re… [+1592 chars]

articles.author: Amy Tennery
articles.title: Olympics-Athletics-American McLaughlin breaks world record to win women's 400 hurdles - The Star Online
articles.description: TOKYO (Reuters) -     Sydney McLaughlin shattered her own 400 metres hurdles world record to win gold in 51.46 seconds on Wednesday, getting the better of fellow American Dalilah Muhammad in a thrilling Tokyo Olympics final that lived up to all expectations.
articles.content: TOKYO (Reuters) - Sydney McLaughlin shattered her own 400 metres hurdles world record to win gold in 51.46 seconds on Wednesday, getting the better of fellow American Dalilah Muhammad in a thrilling … [+2061 chars]
